house_listing.house_description: *End unit townhome*2 br 1.5 tile baths*large kitchen with dining/family area*sliding glass doors lead to fenced back yard*big master br w/2 closets and sliding glass doors to deck*2 yr.Old roof*1yr.Old water htr*appl no older than 5yrs
